com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord

Class RobotOverlord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.RobotOverlord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, WindowListener, EventListener

    public class RobotOverlord
extends Object
implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, KeyListener, com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener, WindowListener
    MainGUI is the root window object.
    Author:
    danroyer

      • updateRecentFiles

        public void updateRecentFiles(String filename)
        changes the order of the recent files list in the File submenu, saves the updated prefs, and refreshes the menus.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to push to the top of the list.

        public void openFile(String filename)
        Open a gcode file to run on a robot. This doesn't make sense if there's more than one robot!
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to open

      • findItemUnderCursor

        protected int findItemUnderCursor(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl2)
        Use glRenderMode(GL_SELECT) to ray pick the item under the cursor. https://github.com/sgothel/jogl-demos/blob/master/src/demos/misc/Picking.java http://web.engr.oregonstate.edu/~mjb/cs553/Handouts/Picking/picking.pdf
        Parameters:
        gl2 - the openGL render context
